titles.title: Affordable Housing and Area Median Income Fairness Act of 2024
Affordable Housing and Area Median Income Fairness Act of 2024

A bill to increase the supply of, and lower rents for, affordable housing and to assess calculations of area median income for purposes of Federal low-income housing assistance, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.
